text: This is the instruction for land animals, birds, and all the creatures that move about in the water, as well as any animal that swarms on the ground,
Eliel the Mahavite; Jeribai and Joshaviah, sons of Elnaam; Ithmah, from Moab;
So the king took refuge in the palace, while the populace gained control of the main streets of the city and prepared for battle.
And he said, â€œWoe also to you scholars of the law! You impose on people burdens hard to carry, but you yourselves do not lift one finger to touch them.
But some of them went to the Pharisees and told them what Jesus had done.
